bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROCESSING AND SETTLING PAYMENT INSTRUCTIONS RELATING TO VARIOUS FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS

abstract.p: A system for facilitating settlement of payments relating to transactions involving financial instruments among multiple participants is provided. An interface receives from participants first and second instructions associated with a financial instrument of a first form, and first and second instructions associated with a financial instrument of a second form. A first processor establishes an association between, and applies a first set of pre-settlement rules to, the first and second instructions associated with the financial instrument of the first form. A second processor establishes an association between, and applies a second set of pre-settlement rules to, the first and second instructions associated with the financial instrument of the second form.

An interface receives from participants first and second instructions associated with a financial instrument of a first form, and first and second instructions associated with a financial instrument of a second form. A first processor establishes an association between, and applies a first set of pre-settlement rules to, the first and second instructions associated with the financial instrument of the first form. bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for processing and settling payment instructions relating to various financial instruments

abstract.p: Systems and methods are provided for processing instructions relating respectively to different forms of financial instruments. In one example, a system comprises an interface configured to receive instructions relating to at least two different forms of financial instruments. The system also comprises a plurality of processors each configured to apply a respective set of pre-settlement rules to instructions relating to financial instruments of a respective form.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROCESSING AND SETTLING PAYMENT INSTRUCTIONS RELATING TO VARIOUS FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS
SYSTÈME ET PROCÉDÉ POUR TRAITER ET RÉGLER DES INSTRUCTIONS DE PAIEMENT CONCERNANT DIVERS INSTRUMENTS FINANCIERS

abstract.p: A system for facilitating settlement of payments relating to transactions involving financial instruments among multiple participants is provided. An interface receives from participants first and second instructions associated with a financial instrument of a first form, and first and second instructions associated with a financial instrument of a second form. A first processor establishes an association between, and applies a first set of pre-settlement rules to, the first and second instructions associated with the financial instrument of the first form. A second processor establishes an association between, and applies a second set of pre- settlement rules to, the first and second instructions associated with the financial instrument of the second form.

L'invention concerne un système destiné à faciliter le règlement de paiements concernant des transactions mettant en jeu des instruments financiers parmi de multiples participants. Une interface reçoit des participants des première et seconde instructions associées à un instrument financier d'une première forme, et des première et seconde instructions associées à un instrument financier d'une seconde forme. Un premier processeur établit une association entre les première et seconde instructions associées à l'instruction financière de la première forme, et le premier processeur leur applique un premier ensemble de règles de pré-règlement. Un second processeur établit une association entre les première et seconde instructions associées à l'instruction financière de la seconde forme, et le second processeur leur applique un second ensemble de règles de pré-règlement.
